title: How to Survive Your First Day in Minecraft (Xbox)

steps.headline: Create a new world.
steps.description: Come up with a name for your world , you can name it something like "(your name)'s world ".

steps.headline: Once you spawn, look around.
steps.description: A lucky spawn is an area filled with trees, underground mines, and animals. An unlucky spawn is an island surrounded by water , if you do spawn in one of these then don't panic just look for a forest.

steps.headline: Start cutting down some trees.
steps.description: You're going to need at least 8 blocks of wood to make tools and  a crafting table.

steps.headline: Press x and open your crafting bar.
steps.description: Craft wooden planks and make a crafting table. You're going to need it a lot , so don't loose it or leave it there.

steps.headline: Craft some sticks .
steps.description: You will need sticks to make some tools.

steps.headline: Open your crafting table and craft at least a wooden sword, ax and pickaxe.
Dig a 3x3 hole(3 blocks deep), get in it, and start digging.
steps.description: You will come across stone. Mine it with your pickaxe. You need to get 8 blocks of cobblestone to craft a furnace. You can also use cobblestone to craft better tools.

steps.headline: Craft torches.
steps.description: In order to craft torches, you will need to find coal. If you don't have coal, you can smelt wood in a furnace to get charcoal. You also need at least one stick. Place torches as you mine to light up the area and prevent monsters from spawning.

steps.headline: If it is still daytime, kill some sheep to get wool (or shear them if you have a pair of shears; you need three blocks of wool and three wooden planks to make a bed) get food by killing pigs, cows, chickens, or zombies (zombies drop rotten flesh, which you can eat, but it may make you sick, so only use this as a last resort) and maybe renovate your shelter.
